name: Akuto: Mad World (BIC Fest 2017)
description:
Akuto: Mad World is an award-nominated fast-paced arena action game with swords and guns. Death is common but by using your weapons and the environment, you can survive to fight another day.

This is a special build of Akuto: Mad World created for the eSports tournament at BIC Fest 2017.

Thank you for playing Akuto: Mad World. The eSports tournament is now over and you can purchase the full game from itch.io, Steam or Humble Store.
